content.body: is `createConicGradient` now supported in Chrome — without needing to enable the `#new-canvas-2d-api` flag?
content.formatted_body: is createConicGradient now supported in Chrome — without needing to enable the #new-canvas-2d-api flag?

content.body: sideshowbarker: mdn suggests no, but maybe it's out of date: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/createConicGradient
content.formatted_body: sideshowbarker: mdn suggests no, but maybe it's out of date: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/createConicGradient

content.body: ntim: yeah, testing in Chrome just now seems to indicate that MDN (BCD) is out of date on this — it seems to work without  #new-canvas-2d-api needing to be enabled
content.formatted_body: ntim: yeah, testing in Chrome just now seems to indicate that MDN (BCD) is out of date on this — it seems to work without #new-canvas-2d-api needing to be enabled
